import React, { Component } from 'react'; import styles from "./custom.module.css" ; import axios from 'axios'; class Success extends Component { state = { contacts: [] } handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); const url = "http://localhost:80/react-backend/get.php"; axios.get(url).then(response => response.data) .then((data) => { this.setState({ contacts: data }) console.log(this.state.contacts) }) } render() { return (
